Desc.entry: Offers good quality, affordable housing within South Yorkshire (in Sheffield - mainly in the North and East of the city). Recognised as a Black and Minority Ethnic (BME) Housing Association with more than 80% of its board members from a BME background. Aims for staff ethnicity and gender to reflect the make-up of tenants. Tenants and residents are actively encouraged to contribute towards improving service delivery through their own forums, focus groups, newsletters and website.

ContactName.entry: Brian Summerson, Association Secretary/Jamie Taylor, Head of Neighbourhood Services
